name: Engine Calamity: Christmas
description:
All you need is a mouse! Click to start a level. Guide each train to their color corresponding stations, either by switching tracks,  avoiding trains, stopping at houses, or going through tunnels.

The game contains one eras, with fiteen levels, and each level increasingly harder, with a fairly high difficulty curve. In the first few levels, you will learn one new thing to help you on your journey to save Christmas.

Also comes with a special boss fight mode, and a custom level editor to build and play your own levels. Type "speedrun" to enable a timer.

Inspired by Train Crisis, created by U-Play. Music credits goes to them.
